block.p: LEAD: Closings in the week ending Dec.19 MANHATTAN Greenwich Village $350,000 155 Perry Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,208-sq.-ft loft condo in a recently renovated prewar factory building; dining area, fireplace, high-ceilings, Jacuzzi in bath; common charge $136, taxes $4,560 (Broker: Debra Kameros)

LEAD: Closings in the week ending Dec.19 MANHATTAN Greenwich Village $350,000 155 Perry Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,208-sq.-ft loft condo in a recently renovated prewar factory building; dining area, fireplace, high-ceilings, Jacuzzi in bath; common charge $136, taxes $4,560 (Broker: Debra Kameros)

Closings in the week ending Dec.19 MANHATTAN Greenwich Village $350,000 155 Perry Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,208-sq.-ft loft condo in a recently renovated prewar factory building; dining area, fireplace, high-ceilings, Jacuzzi in bath; common charge $136, taxes $4,560 (Broker: Debra Kameros) Upper East Side $400,000 165 East 72d Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1.200-sq.-ft. postwar co-op; 24-hr. doorman, manned elevator, dining area, large kitchen; maintenance $1,179, 50% tax-deductible (Broker: M.J. Raynes) Upper East Side $500,000 515 East 79th Street (Asten House) 3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, postwar co-op; 24-hr. doorman, concierge, raised, windowed dining area; maintenance $1,619, 50% tax-deductible (Broker: Sulzberger-Rolfe) Upper East Side $205,000 111 East 88th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 750-sq.-ft. prewar condo; 24-hr. doorman, dining area, high-ceilings, hardwood floors; common charge $228, taxes $1,140 (Broker: Bartlett Associates) Upper West Side $162,300 250 West 75th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 750-sq.-ft. prewar co-op; remodeled kitchen and bath, new windows; maintenance $265, 50% tax deductible (Broker: Joffee LaSalle) Washington Heights $112,000 350 Cabrini Boulevard 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 900-sq.-ft. co-op in a recently renovated prewar building; part-time doorman, dining foyer, parquet floors, Hudson River view; maintenance $425, 39% tax-deductible (Broker: C-Uptown Realty) BRONX Riverdale $85,000 5614 Netherland Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 750-sq.-ft. postwar co-op; remodeled kitchen, parquet floors; maintenance $424, includes gas and electricity, 30% tax-deductible (Broker: Kahan & Kahan Realty) Wakefield $160,000 4317 Bruner Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, single-family, semi-attached, brick house; dining room, large kitchen, finished basement, detached, 1-car garage, 25- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $1,355 (Broker: Albert R. Bryant Real Estate) BROOKLYN Kensington $55,000 135 Ocean Parkway (Caton Towers) 600-sq.-ft. L-shaped, postwar, alcove studio; 24-hr. doorman, separate dressing area, optional garage space; maintenance $311, 33% tax-deductible (Broker: Elise Franco Brown) Park Slope $340,000 558 10th Street 3-family, attached, brick house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, dining area, large kitchen, slate mantels, pine floors in each; south garden, 19- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $1,118 (Broker: FJ Kazeroid Realty Group) QUEENS Astoria $425,000 25-27 12th Street 2-family, detached, frame house; 2 bedrooms, fireplace in primary unit; 1 bedroom in other; 1 bath, large kitchens in each; full basement, 50- by 100-ft, lot; taxes $850 (Broker: Century 21/Metalios Real Estate) Forest Hills $82,000 77-16 Austin Street (Valeria Arms) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 600-sq.-ft. prewar co-op; windowed kitchen, high-ceilings, hardwood floors; maintenance $350, 50% tax-deductible (Broker: Terrace Realty) STATEN ISLAND Graniteville $145,000 36 Anita Street (Cypress Crest Condominiums) 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath duplex co-op in a year-old end unit; dining room, large kitchen, laundry room, outside storage shed; common charge $70, 100% tax-abated (Broker: George K. Wonica) Great Kills $212,000 43 Country Woods Lane 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, single-family, detached, raised-ranch; dining area, large kitchen, family room in finished basement, c/a.
